movies.Title: Dogma
movies.Actors: Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Linda Fiorentino
movies.Plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

movies.Title: Clerks
movies.Actors: Brian O'Halloran, Jeff Anderson, Marilyn Ghigliotti
movies.Plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

movies.Title: Mallrats
movies.Actors: Shannen Doherty, Jeremy London, Jason Lee, Claire Forlani
movies.Plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.
movies.Production: Universal Pictures, Alphaville Films, View Askew Productions

movies.Title: Mr. Robot
movies.Actors: Rami Malek, Christian Slater, Carly Chaikin
movies.Plot: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works f
movies.Language: English, Swedish, Danish, Chinese, Persian, Spanish, Samoan, Arabic, German
movies.Awards: Won 3 Primetime Emmys. 21 wins & 82 nominations total

movies.Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
movies.Actors: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Nicholas Brendon, Alyson Hannigan
movies.Plot: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.
movies.Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. 52 wins & 133 nominations total

movies.Title: Rick and Morty
movies.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
movies.Plot: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.
movies.Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 16 wins & 25 nominations.
